name: Notebook Game (Data Overflow)
description:
Would you like some satisfying platformer game? Here's it!

You are stuck inside a notebook filled with dangers and puzzles.. WAIT! Don't die! Otherwise crazy things will happen.. Hmm.. do you think you can win the game? 

Dive into the artistic world, calm music and relax, as you uncover the hidden pages of the notebook.

CONTROLS:   

This game is a submission for Wowie Jam 3.0 (2021)

Attribution:

Music sourced from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/The_Kyoto_Connection

A game made with Godot
